sentences: _app_ - An app mysteriously appears on your phone that does something amazing. What does it do?
_app_ - How many apps do you have on your phone?
_app_ - What apps have changed your life a lot?
_app_ - What are the three best apps on your phone?
_app_ - What do app makers do that really annoys you?
_app_ - What is the most annoying app you have tried?
_app_ - What is the most useful app on your phone?
_app_ - What is the strangest app you have heard of or tried?
_app_ - What’s the most addictive mobile game you have played?
_app_ - Which app has helped society the most? Which one has hurt society the most?
_app_ - Which app seemed like magic the first time you used it?
_book_ - Do you prefer fiction or nonfiction books?
_book_ - Do you prefer physical books or ebooks?
_book_ - Do you think people read more or less books now than 50 years ago?
_book_ - How fast do you read?
_book_ - How often do you go to the library?
_book_ - Now that indie publishing has become easier, have books gotten better or worse?
_book_ - What book genres do you like to read?
_book_ - What book has had the biggest effect on the modern world?
_book_ - What book has had the biggest impact on your life?
_book_ - What book has influenced you the most?
_book_ - What is the longest book you have read?
_book_ - What was the last book you read?
_book_ - What was the worst book you had to read for school? How about the best book you had to read for school?
_book_ - What was your favorite book as a child?
_clothes_ Do you care about fashion? What style of clothes do you usually wear?
_clothes_ Does fashion help society in any way?
_clothes_ How do clothes change how the opposite sex views a person?
_clothes_ If you didn’t care at all what people thought of you, what clothes would you wear?
_clothes_ What is a fashion trend you are really glad went away?
_clothes_ What is the best pair of shoes you have ever owned? Why were they so good?
_clothes_ What is the most comfortable piece of clothing you own?
_clothes_ What is the most embarrassing piece of clothing you own?
_clothes_ What is your favorite shirt?
_clothes_ What old trend is coming back these days?
_clothes_ Who do you think has the biggest impact on fashion trends: actors and actresses, musicians, fashion designers, or consumers?
_education_ - Are bigger or small schools better?
_education_ - How can governments make education more efficient?
_education_ - How can technology improve education? Can it hurt education?
_education_ - How has the education you received changed your life?
_education_ - Is teaching a skill that can be taught?
_education_ - What are some good and bad things about the education system in your country?
_education_ - What do you think of homeschooling?
_education_ - What do you think of online education?
_education_ - What do you think of standardized tests?
_education_ - What or who has taught you most of the information you use on a regular basis?
_education_ - What will the future of education be?
_food_ - Do you like spicy food? Why or why not? What is the spiciest thing you have ever eaten?
_food_ - Does government have a place in regulating food? To what extent should government regulate food?
_food_ - If your life was a meal, what would kind of meal would it be?
_food_ - What do you get every time you go grocery shopping?
_food_ - What do you think of buffets?
_food_ - What food do you know you shouldn’t eat but can’t help yourself?
_food_ - What food looks disgusting but tastes delicious?
_food_ - What foods do you absolutely hate?
_food_ - What is your favorite food?
_food_ - What would you want your last meal to be if you were on death row?
_food_ - When people make mistakes about food (especially foreign food) do you feel the need to correct them? (i.e. sushi / sashimi or stromboli / calzone)
_food_ - When was the last time you had a food fight?
_goals_ - Do you usually achieve goals you set? Why or why not?
_goals_ - Have your parents influenced what goals you have?
_goals_ - How do you plan to make the world a better place?
_goals_ - How have your goals changed over your life?
_goals_ - How much do you plan for the future?
_goals_ - What are some goals you have already achieved?
_goals_ - What are some goals you have failed to accomplish?
_goals_ - What are your goals for the next two years?
_goals_ - What do you hope to achieve in your professional life?
_goals_ - What is the best way to stay motivated and complete goals?
_goals_ - What is the craziest, most outrageous thing you want to achieve?
_goals_ - What personal goals do you have?
_goals_ - When do you want to retire? What do you want to do when you retire?
_holiday_ Do you wish there were more or less holidays? Why?
_holiday_ Does having a day off for a holiday increase or decrease productivity at work?
_holiday_ If some of the lesser known holidays were commercialized, what would the commercialization look like?
_holiday_ If you could make a holiday, what would it be like? What traditions would it have? What would people eat on your holiday?
_holiday_ If you had to get rid of a holiday, which would you get rid of? Why?
_holiday_ What do you know about the history of some holidays?
_holiday_ What holidays have been over commercialized?
_holiday_ What is the biggest holiday for your family?
_holiday_ What is your favorite holiday?
_holiday_ What kinds of food do you usually eat on your favorite holiday?
_movie_ - Do movies have the same power as books to change the world?
_movie_ - Do you like documentaries? Why / why not?
_movie_ - Do you like horror movies? Why or why not?
_movie_ - Do you prefer to watch movies in the theater or in the comfort of your own home?

_movie_ - Which do you prefer? Books or movies?
_music_ - Are there any songs that always bring a tear to your eye?
_music_ - Do you like classical music?
_music_ - Do you like going to concerts? Why or why not? What was the last concert you went to?

_music_ - What was the last song you listened to?

_music_ - Who was the first band or musician you were really into? Do you still like them?
_phone_ - Do you always have to have the latest phone?
_phone_ - Do you experience phantom vibration? (Feeling your phone vibrate even though it didn’t.)
_phone_ - Do you text more or call more? Why?

_phone_ - What do you wish your phone could do?

_phone_ - What will phones be like in 10 years?
_random_ - A portal to another world opens in front of you. You don’t know how long it will stay open or if you’ll be able to get back after you go through. What do you do?
_random_ - Are you a very organized person?
_random_ - Are you very active of do you prefer to just relax in your free time?
_random_ - Do you have any pets? What are their names?
_random_ - Do you like reality TV shows? Why or why not? If so, which ones?
_random_ - Has anyone ever saved your life?
_random_ - Have you ever saved an animal’s life? How about a person’s life?
_random_ - Have you ever spoke in front of a large group of people? How did it go?

_random_ - How much time do you spend on the internet? What do you usually do?
_random_ - How often do you binge watch shows?
_random_ - How often do you curse?
_random_ - How often do you help others? Who do you help? How do you help?
_random_ - How often do you stay up past 3 a.m.?
_random_ - How should success be measured? By that measurement, who is the most successful person you know?
_random_ - If you could bring back one TV show that was cancelled, which one would you bring back?
_random_ - If you could call up anyone in the world and have a one hour conversation, who would you call?
_random_ - If you could have any animal as a pet, what animal would you choose?
_random_ - If you could learn the answer to one question about your future, what would the question be?

_random_ - If you opened a business, what kind of business would it be?
_random_ - If you were a king / queen, what would your throne look like?
_random_ - If you were on the run from the police for a crime you didn’t commit, where would you go?
_random_ - If your mind was an island, what would it look like?
_random_ - Time freezes for everyone but you for one day. What do you do?

_random_ - Where is the worst place you have been stuck for a long time?

_random_ - Who was your best friend in elementary school?
_random_ - Who would be the worst person to be stuck in an elevator with? How about the best person to be stuck in an elevator with?
_random_ - Who, besides your parents, had the biggest impact on your life?

_random_ - You have to relive one day of your life forever. Which day do you choose?

_tech_ - Can you think of any technology that has only made the world worse? How about a piece of technology that has only made the world better?
_tech_ - Does technology simplify life or make it more complicated?
_tech_ - What do you think the next big technological advance will be?
_tech_ - What is your favorite piece of technology that you own?
_tech_ - What piece of technology is really frustrating to use?
_tech_ - What piece of technology would look like magic or a miracle to people in medieval Europe?

_tech_ - Which emerging technology are you most excited about?
_tech_ - Will technology save the human race or destroy it?
_travel_ - Do you prefer to go off the beaten path when you travel?
_travel_ - Do you prefer traveling alone or with a group?
_travel_ - Have you traveled to any different countries? Which ones?
_travel_ - How do you think traveling to a lot of different countries changes a person?
_travel_ - Talk about some of the interesting people you have met while traveling.
_travel_ - What do you think of stay-cations? (Vacationing and seeing tourist attractions where you live.)
_travel_ - What do you think of tour group packages?
_travel_ - What is the longest plane trip you have taken?
_travel_ - What is the worst hotel you have stayed at? How about the best hotel?
_travel_ - What was the most over hyped place you’ve traveled to?
_travel_ - What’s the best thing about traveling? How about the worst thing?
_travel_ - What’s the best way to travel? (Plane, car, train, etc.)
_travel_ - Where do you get your recommendations for what to do and where to stay when you travel?
_travel_ - Where is the most awe inspiring place you have been?
_travel_ - Where is the most relaxing place you have been?
